Question #1: Did anyone else experience excruciating pain (places where you may have bone lesions) during the final 19-21 of Revlimid? New to our world and noticed in September and now again in October, less severe as they did low3er my dosage. Curious if this gets better with time.
I decided to try to buy myself more time of life even if God controls it . I choose treatment over death or at lest try. But Revlimid is the drug of choice from the beginning,from the doctors.

A relative had hep C  and found that high dose Curcumin dropped his liver fibrosis in half over 6 months. He came down with multiple myeloma about 20 years ago and has been on revlimid for for a few years. He recently added Curcumin and his MM markers dropped in half. His doctor is very surprised. M
